alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 9:17PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Traverse, northwestern Big Stone, Roberts and eastern Marshall Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1017 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lidgerwood to near New Effington to Agency Village to Pickerel Lake Rec Area. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Effington around 1020 PM CDT. Victor and Dakota Connection & Casino around 1025 PM CDT. Rosholt around 1030 PM CDT. Browns Valley, Peever and Lake Traverse Housing Units around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Peever Flats Housing, Mud Lake Landing, Whiterock Colony, Traverse Country Park, Silver Bridge, Rainbow Island, Wheaton, Halls Landing, Siloah Country Church, Yankeetown, Beardsley and Immanuel Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
